text: How do we access these settings via hubl? I'm familiar with the email template colors etc. but couldnt figure this one out?
<@U7SL518D6> maybe add a section to the HubL Variables documentation page for all the branding variables?
Hi Stefen, I’m looking into this.

So, it currently appears that these variables are not exposed in the developer info, unlike the email variables.

For context these settings affect the sales tools. I’ll be digging into this a bit more but something that became obvious to me as I was looking into it.

These color settings, you wouldn’t want to pull from here for say a website anyways. Ideally you would use theme fields because it offers a significantly better content editor experience.
oh, interesting. Maybe eventually there could be a portal-wide brand settings that would be the default in the email and sales and other places these places can be set
